column1: #text=In the early evening , my friend has a birthday party that he has invited me too .
#text=He knows that I am a good baker , and has asked me to bake a cake for him .
#text=I obliged , being very excited to make something for my friend .
#text=I went out to the gorcery store to pick up a few last ingredients that I would need , and after arriving home , set out all my tools necessary to complete the task .
#text=There was a good chance that some people would n't like the cake , but usually it 's a great hit whenever I bake something .
#text=After reviewing the recipe and getting the cake in the oven at the correct temperature , I decided taking a quick break would be a good idea .
#text=I heated leftovers from the night before , and had that for lunch while waiting for my now baked cakes to cool .
#text=After that , building the cake was so simple !
#text=It turned out to my standards , I loved it !
